languages.text: "Нет участи достойнее очищения муками во имя веры. Но тебя обманули, слуга Омниссии, — твои страдания не сдерживают скверну, а лишь подпитывают ее. Еще не поздно исторгнуть ее из себя!"

traits.locale_text: "Нет участи достойнее очищения муками во имя веры. Но тебя обманули, слуга Омниссии, — твои страдания не сдерживают скверну, а лишь подпитывают ее. Еще не поздно исторгнуть ее из себя!"

languages.text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"
languages.original_text: "Нет участи достойнее очищения муками во имя веры. Но тебя обманули, слуга Омниссии, — твои страдания не сдерживают скверну, а лишь подпитывают ее. Еще не поздно исторгнуть ее из себя!"

traits.locale_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

"There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

"There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

languages.text: 「信仰の名による苦難を通じた浄化以上に名誉ある運命はない。しかし、お前は欺かれたのだ、万機神の下僕よ！お前の苦しみは腐敗を食い止めるものではなく、それを維持している。この汚れを追放するのは今からでも遅くはない！」
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: 「信仰の名による苦難を通じた浄化以上に名誉ある運命はない。しかし、お前は欺かれたのだ、万機神の下僕よ！お前の苦しみは腐敗を食い止めるものではなく、それを維持している。この汚れを追放するのは今からでも遅くはない！」

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas de destin plus honorable que la purge par la souffrance, accomplie au nom de la foi. Mais vous avez été dupé, serviteur de l'Omnimessie ! Vos tourments ne repoussent pas la corruption : ils l'aident à croître. Il n'est pas trop tard pour vous débarrasser de ce fléau ! »
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas de destin plus honorable que la purge par la souffrance, accomplie au nom de la foi. Mais vous avez été dupé, serviteur de l'Omnimessie ! Vos tourments ne repoussent pas la corruption : ils l'aident à croître. Il n'est pas trop tard pour vous débarrasser de ce fléau ! »

languages.text: “这世上最光荣的命运，就是以信仰之名受苦受难，从而得到净化。不过，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人啊，你被骗了！你的苦难并没有抑制腐化，反而是在助长腐化。立刻祛除这邪恶的疫病吧，此刻依然为时不晚！”
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: “这世上最光荣的命运，就是以信仰之名受苦受难，从而得到净化。不过，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人啊，你被骗了！你的苦难并没有抑制腐化，反而是在助长腐化。立刻祛除这邪恶的疫病吧，此刻依然为时不晚！”

languages.text: «No hay destino más honorable que la expiación mediante el sufrimiento en nombre de la fe. ¡Mas caíste en la trampa, sirviente del Omnissiah! Tu tormento no detiene la corrupción, sino que la mantiene. ¡No es demasiado tarde para expulsar esta plaga!».
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: «No hay destino más honorable que la expiación mediante el sufrimiento en nombre de la fe. ¡Mas caíste en la trampa, sirviente del Omnissiah! Tu tormento no detiene la corrupción, sino que la mantiene. ¡No es demasiado tarde para expulsar esta plaga!».

languages.text: "Kein Schicksal ist so ehrenvoll wie Läuterung durch Leid im Namen des Glaubens. Aber Ihr würdet getäuscht, Diener des Omnissiah! Eure Qualen halten die Korruption nicht zurück — sie nähren sie. Es ist noch nicht zu spät, diese Seuche auszutreiben!"
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: "Kein Schicksal ist so ehrenvoll wie Läuterung durch Leid im Namen des Glaubens. Aber Ihr würdet getäuscht, Diener des Omnissiah! Eure Qualen halten die Korruption nicht zurück — sie nähren sie. Es ist noch nicht zu spät, diese Seuche auszutreiben!"

languages.text: "İnanç uğruna acı çekerek arınmaktan daha onurlu bir kader olamaz. Ancak sen, Hermesih'in hizmetkârı, kandırıldın. Çektiğin acı, yozlaşmayı durdurmuyor. Aksine, besliyor. Bu beladan kurtulmak için henüz geç değil!"
languages.original_text: "There is no fate more honourable than purgation through suffering in the name of faith. But you were deceived, servant of the Omnissiah! Your torment is not holding back the corruption — it is sustaining it. It is not too late to expel this blight!"

traits.locale_text: “İnanç uğruna acı çekerek arınmaktan daha onurlu bir kader olamaz. Ancak sen, Hermesih’in hizmetkârı, kandırıldın. Çektiğin acı, yozlaşmayı durdurmuyor. Aksine, besliyor. Bu beladan kurtulmak için henüz geç değil!”
